select /* selectUserByUserManageId */
from user_manage a left join user_auth b ON a.user_manage_id = b.user_manage_id and b.delete_ornot = 'N' left join auth c ON b.auth_id = c.auth_id and c.delete_ornot = 'N' left join trial_manage d ON a.trial_manage_id = d.trial_manage_id and d.delete_ornot = 'N' and d.trial_status_code = '00' and DF14(d.trial_end_date) > DF14(NOW()) and d.product_id = #{productId} where a.user_manage_id = #{userManageId} and c.product_id = #{productId} and a.delete_ornot <> 'Y'

select /* selectUserByUserId */
from user_manage a left join user_auth b ON a.user_manage_id = b.user_manage_id and b.delete_ornot = 'N' left join auth c ON b.auth_id = c.auth_id and c.delete_ornot = 'N' left join trial_manage d ON a.trial_manage_id = d.trial_manage_id and d.delete_ornot = 'N' and d.trial_status_code = '00' and DF14(d.trial_end_date) > DF14(NOW()) and d.product_id = #{productId} where a.user_id = #{userId} and c.product_id = #{productId} and a.delete_ornot <> 'Y'

SELECT /* selectFileListByFileId */ a.atch_file_id, b.file_cn, b.file_sn, b.file_stre_cours, b.stre_file_nm, b.file_extsn, b.orignl_file_nm, b.file_size, DF14(a.creat_dt) as creat_dt FROM comtnfile a, comtnfiledetail b WHERE a.atch_file_id in (#{fileId}) AND a.atch_file_id = b.atch_file_id AND a.use_at = 'y' ORDER BY b.file_sn
